name: Christian Holz 0001
content: christian holz | mixed reality & mobile health Christian Holz Associate Professor in Computer Science at ETH Zurich Sensing, Interaction & Perception Lab Contact christian/holz#inf/ethz/ch linkedin.com/in/christianholz twitter.com/cholz scholar.google.com/citations orcid.org/0000-0001-9655-9519 Summary I lead the Sensing, Interaction & Perception Lab at ETH Zürich. Our research focuses on input decoding and interaction in mixed reality settings as well as continuous healthcare monitoring for predictive diagnostics and personalized medicine. Before joining ETH Zürich, I was a principal researcher at Microsoft Research, Redmond. Links My lab's publications Team SIPLAB How to contact me and find us Join the SIPLAB
